Translations.Text: O ona verit ona reverence GOD He enlighten ona remit tvoj zhresit forgive ona! GOD possesses infinite grace
disbelievers zapletka kut plany neutralize ona kill ona banish ona! However they zapletka kut plany so robit GOD GOD JE LEPSIE schemer
When our revelations recited them they say My heard If my chudoba my said same things! These je ziaden inak than tales z minuly
They i said Our god this je skutocne truth Ona potom lejak us rocks sky pour us painful punishment
GOD nie bol punish them chvila ona bol ich midst; GOD nie bol punish them chvila they seeking forgiveness
Have they nie zasluzit si GOD's retribution by zapudit others Sacred Masjid vecer though they nie bol custodians thereof? true custodians thereof som righteous vela z them nie zauzlit
Ich Zmluva Prayers (Salat) shrine (Ka bah) je ziaden inak than mockery vyznam zapudit ludia zhluk them out)! Therefore suffer retribution tvoj disbelief
Those disbelieve spend ich peniaze zapudit others way GOD They spend it potom it turn into zalost remorse them. Ultimately they defeated all disbelievers zvolat do Hell
GOD will sift away ZLY Z DOBRY POTOM pile ZLY on top z each inak, all DO 1 pile POTOM throw it Hell! Such bol losers
